WEATHER FORECAST FOR 18 June 2024
Issued at 12.00 noon on 17 June 2024

T
he  prevailing  rainy  condition  in  the  south-western  part  of  the  island  is  expected  to  be
somewhat enhanced in the next few days from 19th June.

S
everal  spells  of  showers  will  occur  in  Western, Sabaragamuwa  and  North-western  provinces
and in Galle, Matara, Kandy and Nuwara-Eliya districts.

S
trong winds of about (40-50) kmph can be expected at times over the Western slopes of the
central  hills,  Northern,  North-central  and  North-western  provinces  and
Hambantota and Monaragala districts.
Rainfall amount (mm): Light: 00-12.5, Light to moderate: 12.5-25, Moderate: 25-50, Fairly heavy rain: 50 -100,
Heavy rain: 100 – 150, Very heavy rain: 150 or more.
තද වැසි:100 – 150, ඉතා තද වැසි: 150 හ ෝ ඊට වැඩි
